<LocalizedProperties><Language>en</Language><Title>Bundle Security Update for * Windows (from KB2862335)</Title><Description>A security issue has been identified in a Microsoft software product that could affect your system. You can help protect your system by installing this update from Microsoft. For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article. After you install this update, you may have to restart your system.</Description><UninstallNotes>This software update can be removed by selecting View installed updates in the Programs and Features Control Panel.</UninstallNotes><MoreInfoUrl>https://gosecure.net</MoreInfoUrl><SupportUrl>https://gosecure.net</SupportUrl></LocalizedProperties>
